name: Living dead 2
description:
Welcome to the city of the living dead where the zombies rule and drives away people out in the desert.
The only one who dare to stand up against the raging evil of the city is you and you need to make sure you get the every last one of them killed.
Lock and load - its killing time again!

Top notch gaming graphics to the very high end suitable for any device to play
Awesome sound effects
You could almost feel the recoil of the gun in your device while playing
Once you get the grab of this you can take on the head shots, combine 2 or 3 kills in one single shot

This is war for your survival, do you have the nerves to take on the zombies?

For more awesome games and features, news and uppcomming stuff,
visit us at www.psychozombie.com
